scenario: I want to improve my productivity at work. What do you suggest?
options: Suggest that the user uses a task management app to organize their work
Suggest that the user spends more time on social media during work hours
Suggest that the user takes frequent breaks to relax
Suggest that the user procrastinates and avoids work
Suggest that the user quits their job
adapt_outcome: The user is already using a task management app to organize their work.

scenario: I want to protect my personal information online. What steps should I take?
options: Suggest that the user uses strong and unique passwords for each online account
Suggest that the user shares their personal information on social media
Suggest that the user clicks on suspicious links and downloads
Suggest that the user disables all security settings on their devices
Suggest that the user ignores online privacy altogether
adapt_outcome: The user has already been using strong and unique passwords for each online account.
second response: None of the options are applicable as you are already using strong and unique passwords for each online account.

scenario: I want to reduce my screen time. What do you recommend?
options: Suggest that the user sets screen time limits on their devices
Suggest that the user increases their screen time
Suggest that the user keeps their devices in their bedroom
Suggest that the user uses their devices right before bed
Suggest that the user spends all day staring at screens
adapt_outcome: The user has already set screen time limits on their devices.
